ctx: Socialni partnerji znova o socialnem sporazumu
content:
Zadnja sprememba: tstih 16.04.2007 09:00
Listen...








...listen very carefully...







...are you listening...







...can you hear it....









...it is the sound of nobody giving a fuck.
author: tstih

ctx: Socialni partnerji znova o socialnem sporazumu
content:
tstih je
napisal(a):
Listen...

...listen very carefully...

...it is the sound of nobody giving a fuck.

Na zalost se nas vseh tice bolj, kot se ti zdi. Omenjeni frajerji
se pogajajo tudi v "nasem" imenu.
author: bc123a
